title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Doubles Results
text: May 8, 2018 / 1:21 AM / Updated 14 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Doubles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read May 8 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Doubles matches on Monday .. 1st Round .. 1-Lukasz Kubot (POL) and (Bye) Marcelo Melo (BRA) Pablo Cuevas (URU) and beat Juan Martin del Potro 6-3 7-6(8) Marcel Granollers (ESP) (ARG) and Dominic Thiem (AUT) 6-Juan Sebastian Cabal (Bye) (COL) and Robert Farah (COL) 3-Henri Kontinen (FIN) and (Bye) John Peers (AUS) 8-Rohan Bopanna (IND) and (Bye) Edouard Roger-Vasselin (FRA) 7-Ivan Dodig (CRO) and (Bye) Rajeev Ram (USA) 4-Pierre-Hugues Herbert (Bye) (FRA) and Nicolas Mahut (FRA) 5-Jamie Murray (GBR) and (Bye) Bruno Soares (BRA) Robin Haase (NED) and beat Santiago Gonzalez (MEX) 7-5 6-3 Jean-Julien Rojer (AHO) and Aisam-Ul-Haq Qureshi (PAK) 2-Bob Bryan (USA) and (Bye) Mike Bryan (USA)
